coin.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a piece of metal, usually flat and round, that is used as money
coin.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: money in the form of metal coins
coin.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to invent a new word or expression, especially one that many people start to use
coin.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: The word ‘aromatherapy’ was coined in the 1920s.
coin.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: to make pieces of money from metal
coin.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: a piece of metal, usually flat and round, that is used as money
coin.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: Since the introduction of the £1 coin, the smallest English note is £5.
coin.translation[2].definitions[1].defin: money in the form of metal coins
coin.translation[3].definitions[0].defin: to make pieces of money from metal
coin.translation[3].definitions[1].defin: to earn a lot of money very quickly
coin.translation[3].definitions[1].examp: Top footballers have been coining it in for years.
